results.title: Can losartan and blood pressure control peri arteriovenous fistula creation ameliorate the early associated left ventricular hypertrophic response a randomised placebo controlled trial
results.text_hl: Placebo controlled double blind randomisation of 26 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ to fixed dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ plus fixed dose @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ or placebo occurred 1 day prior to @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@fistula@@@ creation.
